name: Shrub Camp - Global Game Jam 2019
description:
A Global Game Jam 2019 game about animals on a board, where you compete against your friends and find out who can collect more nuts. 

Jam site: UNISINOS

THIS BUILD IS CONTROLLER ONLY, BUT YOU CAN PLAY IT UP TO 8 FRIENDS.

Credits:

André Schuch - Coding

Klos Cunha - Game Design/UI

Leonardo Tomazi - 3D Models/Sound Design

Mateus Fernandes - Coding

Diversifiers: 
-Always Room for One More (Sponsored by Origin Access)
-Use the Source, Luke (Sponsored by GitHub)
-Keep it simple

Made with Unity
